categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: "Kylo Ren vs. Resistance Rebels" is the forty-fourth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel on April 17, 2020.

The video begins with Supreme Leader Kylo Ren inspecting his First Order stormtroopers aboard the hangar of a Star Destroyer. Ren dons his newly repaired helmet. The video then cuts to Ren leading his troops down a corridor as the narrator explains that in a galaxy of adventures, Kylo Ren and his First Order strike fear throughout the galaxy.

Kylo Ren flies his TIE/wi modified interceptor in formation with two TIE/fo space superiority fighters over a desert world. His stormtroopers advanced on entrenched Resistance soldiers, wiping them out with firepower. The video then cuts to Kylo Ren leading his Knights of Ren into combat. Kylo Ren personally cuts down several Resistance soldiers with his lightsaber. The Knights of Ren and stormtroopers advance with the support of First Order walkers, cutting down more Resistance rebels. Kylo Ren uses the Force to scatter more defenders before swinging his lightsaber.
